name: Triple Fix Brightening Concealer
about: What it is:A luxuriously rich, ultra-creamy concealer that helps visibly brighten, conceal, and nourish the complexion with a skin-like finish..Coverage:Full.Finish:Natural.Formulation:Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients:- Ashwagandha (Indian Ginseng): Acts as a powerful herb to help combat skin stress and visible signs of aging..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This flexible concealer satisfies the craving for coverage while adding a healthy, natural finish to the skin. It is designed to build and layer without settling into fine lines and pores. It is self-setting and designed with both the face and under-eye area in mind.
ingredients: -Ashwagandha (Indian Ginseng): Acts as a powerful herb to help combat skin stress and visible signs of aging. .-Turmeric: Provides antioxidant protection, brightens, and helps even and soothe skin..-Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates. ..Aqua/Water/Eau, Isododecane, Isohexadecane, C13-15 Alkane, Silica, Ethylhexyl Stearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Butylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Tri(Polyglyceryl-3/Lauryl) Hydrogenated Trilinoleate, Quaternium-90 Bentonite, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Chloride, Niacinamide, Triethyl Citrate, Lecithin, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Sodium Hyaluronate, Curcuma Longa Root Oil, Squalane, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Citrullus Vulgaris (Watermellon) Fruit Extract, Withania Somnifera (Ashwagandha) Root Extract, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, Isopropyl Myristate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Isostearic Acid, Polyglycerylu20103 Polyricinoleate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain [+/-]: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499)...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-To highlight, select a shade one or two shades lighter than your skin tone. Use the doe-foot applicator to apply concealer to the high points of the face, including the under-eye area and center of the forehead. .-Build and blend using a sponge or complexion brush..-To spot conceal, use a shade that matches your skin tone. Concentrate product on blemishes, redness, or dark spots prior to applying foundation. .-To contour, use a shade that is one or two shades darker than your skin tone. Buff product into the hallows of the cheek, temples of the forehead, and jawline.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For reference, I have eczema prone eyes and oily skin. I chose a color that was a bit too light for my skin tone, so I tried it as a regular concealer and also to give brightness to other concealers. I ended up returning it based on the color alone after trying to make it work for a month even though I like the formula!  PROS: I loved the serumy texture and it's easy to blend with my fingers or a sponge. The first layer gives medium coverage and is buildable, but it doesn't quite become full. I prefer this in a concealer, but it's not for people who want FULL coverage. It only needs a bit of powder to set. It feels lightweight with a satin finish and it still looks like skin!  CONS: It has to be blended quickly because its stays stuck in place since it sets down as it dries. I have to use an eye cream before, or else it can emphasize my under eye fold. I can only use a small amount of powder or else it gives it a dry textured look.  Overall, it's great formula for the price and it's not the formula's fault that my eyes are so dry.

reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so sad to give this a one star and return itu2026 but it just didnu2019t work for me. At first I loved it! I recently been struggling with super dry under eyes. And the concealer I was previously using was making it worse. So a beauty influencer recommended if you are struggling with dry under eyes use this. At first it was fantastic! Though I did struggle to figure out how to blend it out. My fingers didnu2019t really worku2026 and so I used a damp beauty sponge and I thought it blended nicely but I had to add another layer because you could still see the dark circles under my eyes. I was primarily wearing it when working inside so it looked great. But I remember one of my coworkers pointed out I had really bad sunglasses marks. I went to a mirror to try to fix it but it just made it worse. I tried waiting longer to put my sunglasses on, making sure I had powder and setting sprayu2026 but the make up would be gone from where my sunglasses sat no matter what. Then finally I had to work outside in the summer heat and oh boyu2026 it looked like an oil spill on my face. It looked so cakey, it completely separated and it emphasized my fine lines like crazy - I looked 10 years older. I tried wearing the concealer without powder didnu2019t help, less moisturizer eye cream didnu2019t help, changed my setting spray and still looked terrible once sweat and humidity hit my face. I guess the journey for the perfect concealer continuesu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One thin layer = medium coverage. 2 thin layers or 1 thin layer over color corrector = full coverage!  Pros:  -experienced no breakouts/sensitivities using this  -lightweight formula (doesn't feel heavy/cakey)  -little goes a long way -perfect match after oxidizing -beautiful finish. Looks like my skin but with a glow (like a healthy glow)     Cons:  -packaging sucks (getting wand out of the container) -wand doesn't dispense a lot of product, so I have to go back into the container for more -oxidizes. The undertone of the product doesn't change, but it oxidized to like a shade or a shade and a half darker on me. So the first 10-15min of me wearing this product, I look like I am wearing the wrong shade.   -if I use too much, it can get cakey/heavy. So literally a little goes a long way.    I bought MN3, which oxidizes to like MN5, when I was paler than even my Winter shade. SO now I find that it is too light for me. I will buy TN3 or TN6, which would be my regular shade, in the fall.   I found the perfect match in the concealer, but not in the foundation which sucks as I really like the medium coverage and finish of the foundation. Overall, best make-up product I've tested/used yet so 5 stars!!!

reviews.review_title: Nice Concealer If It's What You're Looking For
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this concealer overall, and I have mostly positive things to say about this product, but I could see how this concealer might not be for everyone. The packaging is super cute and sleek, but I agree with other reviewers that the opening is too small for the applicator and you have to be very precise taking the applicator in and out. I also agree with others that this is not a full coverage product like the description claims.  I personally like the consistency and the finish, however, because I don't want a hardcore full coverage concealer around my eye area or to highlight/brighten certain parts of my face. I use a more matte and fuller coverage concealer if I need to spot conceal acne or redness because this product is not for that, but I like the pretty finish it gives me around my eye area and brow/forehead area for highlighting.  The formula is creamy and gives a medium coverage natural looking satin finish that doesn't settle into fine lines. If you are a tarte shape tape type of person, this aint it for you, but this is a great concealer for those who want a natural medium coverage dewy concealer.

reviews.review_text: LYS sent me 2 shades of this concealer, LN3 and LN6 u2013 not for review, but in lieu of another product I purchased that didnu2019t work for me. Which is, right there and then, outstanding customer service! Overall, I found this concealer to be very easy and pleasant to work with. Perhaps u201cfull coverageu201d is a marketing overstatement, but definitely a solid medium. The formula is liquid, so it spreads easily and the finish is ever so slightly dewy - which makes it a great choice for both under eye area and elsewhere on the face. I will say that if you have serious discoloration to cover, you may be left wanting moreu2026 But where this shines is in how natural, lightweight and skin-like the result is! I do set this product with powder, as it dries a bit tacky, and then it doesnu2019t crease on me. Last thing I will add is the doe-foot wandu2026 At first, I was somewhat annoyed with how large it was compared to the opening of the tube, but pretty soon I got the hang of getting it out/in and it didnu2019t bother me anymore. So my verdict is: good concealer and great brand!

I also do not like the applicator wand.  Itu2019s too long and I feel like itu2019s and effort to reinsert it into the tubing every time I use it. I guess Iu2019ve gotten more used to the chunkier/sturdier packing Tarte and Dior offer and as far as prestige goes, Iu2019m sticking with them.  I would like to say that I have been pleased with other LYS products Iu2019ve recently purchased during the Rouge sale to include their bronzer, cream blush and highlighters.  I have not tried the foundation, but have it on hand so we will see.  Iu2019m exchanging the concealers toward a fragrance mini.

DG3 is also really light out of the bottle, but dried down 3-4 shades darker, so it was a bit hard to work with on initial placement. Would also prefer this without melon in it.  Giving this a 2 as a concealer, 4 as a general face product. I know, I gripe a lot, but I'd still re-buy.

The results were the same, after just a few hours the concealer would separate and make my skin look oily (which I didnu2019t think was possible since I have normal to very dry skin) while at the same time accentuating dry spots and making my skin flakey. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The price point is great for this product, especially because it is u201ccleanu201d.  It has a natural finish; it does not look caked on, and it does not look too much like makeup.  I recommend blending with the fingers rather than a brush.  This is also not for all-day-into-night wear because it can dry to a bit flaky/crunchy after several hours, and I do not have dry under eyes.  I only recommend for under the eyes, not spot concealing because it is not full coverage.  This is great for a school day or work day, casual looks when you want to look fresh and not look like you simply rolled out of bed.  Maybe an online presentation, meetings, running errands, and the like.  This is not for a formal memorable event because it is not glamourous.  It applies smoothly; excellent easy texture to work with, no off-putting scent.  I do not know how buildable it is because I do not pack on product, but the undertone dries down seamlessly.  This is for complimenting your natural look.

reviews.review_text: The Triple Fix Full Coverage Brightening Concealer from LYS Beauty is one of my newest loves.   LYS Beauty recently turned 1 and to celebrate, they launched this amazing new concealer. It's Medium to Full Coverage and comprises of skin-loving ingredients like Hyaluronic Acid, Ashwagandha, Watermelon Extract and Turmeric!   I've been using this concealer all week and it's all I've been reaching for. Some days I just pop a bit of this on and don't even bother with foundation - the results? I get that 'my-skin-but-better' look which for me is amazing because I have so many blemishes and acne scars. So to be able to look like it's my natural skin but without all those imperfections? Yes, yes please.   Now let's talk about application. This formula feels buttery smooth as you apply - almost silky like and it's so easy to blend. It doesn't cake no matter how much you use and you get a beautiful dewy finish. It's so lightweight on your skin; like wearing no make up at all.  I'm so glad I was able to try this out because I absolutely love it and I'm adding it to my favourites collection!

I know crease-free undereyes are unrealistic and I donu2019t expect any concealer to be crease-free since weu2019re moving our faces all day long but I felt like this concealer emphasized the lines under my eyes :(  After a few more hours of wear I also noticed some creasing in my smile lines whereas my NYX side was still smooth. Really wanted this to work since the color match MN3 was really nice on my skin tone and it feels nice and lightweight on the skin but I canu2019t get past the creasing, sadly I will be returning this.

reviews.review_text: This is my new HG concealer. Iu2019ve never used anything quite like it: Itu2019s full coverage, but itu2019s not thick or sticky. It feels like eye cream, I guess? Itu2019s a radiant finish, but doesnu2019t cake, crease or wear off around my glasses. I wore it for 12 hours the first time, and it looked more or less as good as when I put it on. It really does brighten. It blends like a dream and is buildable. Even over powder, as I accidentally discovered. Still no caking. All of this for $18. It boggles! I feel like I discovered some big secret. Ha! The one thing I would change about it is pretty minor: The applicator isnu2019t the doe foot zoveel come to expect. Itu2019s really small, and itu2019s effort-y to get it back into the tube (in fact it actually got my heart rate up, according to Fitbit) That said, Iu2019m happy to deal with in order to keep using this incredible concealer!

reviews.review_title: I've been waiting for this concealer:-)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I knew this concealer will be a hit just like the Triple Fix Serum Foundation. The coverage is definitely buildable. It gives a natural, seamless finish, and is very easy to blend out, no matter how long you let it dry down. The applicator gets right in the creases and evenly distributes the product. The shade DG3 has a beautiful golden undertone. It works well with my setting powders and lasts all day.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: TG1 - latte light tan skin with golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The applicator is very hard to put in an take out, it is a bit to big and you have to squeeze it and angle it just right to get it back in. I am TG1 in the winter and mix with TG5 in the summer to get my proper shade match. TG1 in the concealer was too dark for my undereyes, darker than my foundation. I tried the next shade down and it was too light. The formula was nice and smooth.

reviews.review_title: Great Concealer! I donu2019t like the packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is great concealer that feels very hydrating on the skin, itu2019s easy to blend, hides imperfections really easily, itu2019s a concealer that doesnu2019t crease on me, it has great coverage BUT the packaging is not my favorite. Itu2019s really difficult to get the applicator out because of the slant, not a lot of product comes out so re-dipping is difficult and putting the wand back in is difficult. If packaging doesnu2019t bother you itu2019s a great concealer!

reviews.review_title: Lightweight, hydrating and lasts all day!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am so impressed with the shade range for this concealer!  Having very fair skin, Iu2019ve had trouble in the past finding a concealer that works for me.  They are either white, have a yellow tint or are too dark overall.  This concealer not only matches my fair skin and cool undertones, but it also feels like an extension of my skin as opposed to feeling cakey and heavy.  It is lightweight, creamy, easy to blend, and feels hydrating even on my dry skin.  Best of all, throughout the day it doesnu2019t crease or settle into my pores and fine lines.  I primarily use the concealer to brighten my under eye area and mask dark circles and purple veins but it also works to conceal blemishes and redness all over the face, too.  The curved applicator makes the concealer easier to apply, but it makes it difficult to get the applicator in or out of the thin tube.  My tip is to gently and slowly pull it because if you try and force it quickly, you may bend the applicator or waste product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: MG2 - bisque light golden medium skin with golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a fan. Went on cakey/ heavy and I would not consider it full coverage. Shade is also darker than described. I ended up putting another concealer on over top of this one to make it less dark and heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Med-full coverage, lite weight,  long lasting , and clean !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is great - creamy and very blendable, with medium to full coverage depending on how you blend and layer. The packaging and amount of product, however, arenu2019t ideal. You get 0.179 oz of product (most concealers Iu2019ve tried give you at least 0.25 or 0.3 oz) and the wand is kinda hard to get in and out of the tube. The first time I opened it I splattered product because it took a bit of effort to get the doefoot applicator out of the narrow opening. Not necessarily a dealbreaker, but disappointing nonetheless. The tube is also pretty large and bulky considering the amount of product inside. Itu2019s a good concealer, just not as good a value as the price implies. As of this writing, Sephora also donu2019t list the fluid oz on the site/app, which isnu2019t helpful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It blends beautifully with my complexion and looks very natural. I wear it all day at work and still look great at the end of the day! It's not completely full coverage, I'd say it's about medium, and you can build it up a little bit. If you have dark circles, a color corrector will help you achieve fuller coverage, but I like the result on its own when I'm going for a more natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was able to pick this up in two shades Mn1 and Mn3, I usually get a concealer in my skin shade as well as a little lighter. I got both light medium neutral shades that will do well for concealing spots on my face, the Mn1 is okay under my eyes but I like to go in with something lighter in the inner half to brighten my hereditary dark circles. The concealer is lovely, blends well into the skin and doesnu2019t look cakey under my eyes (I am 57 so this isnu2019t an easy thing). I set the concealer directly under my lower lashes using PMG Labs under eye setting powder. The end result is perfect, just need to get my hands on one of the lighter neutral shades for brightening my inner under eye area. My only complaint is the packaging, the package itself is attractive but the opening is small and the doe foot applicator is slightly bent to make application easier.the result is that it is hard to get the doe foot back into the bottle without forcing it, I feel like I am going to break the applicatoru2026itu2019s that bad. I used to love the Melt Flex Concealer, but the packaging was horribleu2026the little ring on the bottle that removes excess off the applicator always fell off, and not just one bottle but every bottle that I bought. After numerous experiences with concealer pouring out the bottle when I tried using (and ruining numerous outfits as a result) I just quit buying it since they never fixed the issue. I hope that LYS reads these reviews and corrects the packaging, otherwise my love affair with this new concealer will be short lived!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love LYS products, the setting powder is AMAZING! This concealer being this bad is a huge let down!  It is not full coverage, it is not hydrating, there is no skin-like finish, and you cannot build it up, it causes dry flakes and cakeyness. The colors are off. I ordered LG3 which claims to be for fair skin neutral tones, come to find out (after I already ordered it) that is for warm tones. Needless to say, it was too dark for me. I was supposed to order LN3. The packaging is super pretty, but the wand is flimsy, and the doe foot is too big for the tube. Unfortunately, I cannot recommend this concealer. I highly recommend other LYS products.. The setting powder, the blush, and bronzer are all fantastic!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This concealer did not sit well with me.  First of all, it is by no means a full coverage concealer. It feels lightweight and looks lightweight as well.   Secondly, once applied it hardly looks like I have any concealer on. Even with two layers, the coverage is extremely subtle. It might be better on a no foundation day. If I were only using concealer it might work, but even then it would probably still be too light. I even choose two shades lighter for a better brightening effect. However, no brightening and hardly any color.  Lastly, although it's a hydrating concealer it still clung on to dry patches. Apart from the Jaclyn Cosmetics and Elf matte concealer, I've never had a concealer do this.   And one last thing, the wand is flimsy and cheap-like. It feels like the plastic part of a plastic q-tip. It's also a bit rough when inserting and removing the applicator. I'm also considering returning this because I gave it two tries already.  I reviewed and tried this concealer. Just search for lovekeebuu LYS concealer on Youtube.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the feel of this concealer. It has a light weight feel and blends easily. Not too thick or too thin where it feels like it wonu2019t have enough coverage. Lately Iu2019ve been doing really natural coverage and this looks like my skin. I have been using shade TG1 which is a little darker than my skin but still blendable. I will be trying another shade just to Match me a little better.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: MN1 - ivory beige light medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just used this product the last two days and I love the formula but I definitely need a lighter shade. The shade I got was a bit too yellow for my skin and Iu2019m very fair. It is creamy and really good coverage and I think it I get a lighter shade I will like it. The only other thing I didnu2019t like was the applicator. It gets stuck in the tube a bit as well. I do like the formula though so Iu2019m willing to use it still.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this concealer. It has great coverage, itu2019s lightweight and it blends so easily. I donu2019t need to use a lot to get the results I am looking for. One downside is itu2019s really difficult to remove and insert the application wand. Other than that, I am really happy with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this based on the claims that it's full coverage, ultra creamy and nourishing with a natural finish but I didn't find any of that to be true and LN3 is too dark.  The formula is thin and lightweight but the coverage is medium at best and, whenever I tried to build it in order to cover redness or dark circles, it just emphasized texture and looked dry.   I'm very fair with a cool undertone and the lightest shade has a warm golden undertone so I bought the next one up, LN3, which has a neutral undertone; unfortunately it's about 1-1.5 shades darker than my skintone.   I tried this concealer multiple times, with primer (Tatcha liquid Silk Canvas & Good Molecules Silicone Free Priming Moisturizer) and without; with sponge and brush (Sonia G Classic Base, which is made for creams/liquids); and it always just looked cakey and dry.  **For reference, my best foundation matches are MAC Studio Fix in NW10, Estee Lauder DW in 1C0 Shell and YSL All Hours in BR10.  To those looking for a full coverage option, I highly recommend Dior's Forever concealer, just know that the lightest shade, 00, is only available on Dior's site, labeled for some reason as a universal brightener.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the triple fix foundationu2026but this seems to be an entirely different kind of formula. I feel like Iu2019m loosing my mind because this is neither creamy nor full coverage. However, it did feel lightweight. I also found it to set to a tone about 1/2 shade darker than the shade LN3 in the foundation, which is not personally what Iu2019m looking for in a concealer. Overall, it dried to0 dark, felt drying, and didnu2019t cover anything under my eyes (maybe this was due to it being too dark, which is disappointing, as itu2019s the lightest neutral shade).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What I love about this concealer is that itu2019s lightweight but gives me enough coverage. I have very dark under eyes, they are hereditary. So I always struggle with finding a concealer that will give me coverage but not dry me out. LYS Beauty heard all of us and what we really need and this concealer will be a staple in my routine from now on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This concealer was a little light but looked really nice. Love how well it blended out and applicator had the right amount of curve to it. Helps cover up blemishes and dark undereyes.

reviews.review_title: My everyday concealer my new love
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this concealer. I use to love nars concealer but now this will my day to day concealer. Perfect shade for me, very easy to blend, looks super natural on me. Plus the packaging is super cute and very unique. Worth every penny. Very hydrating, not cakey, blends easily, very well made. I would recommend this concealer with my eyes close. Its a no brainer we have to buy this concealer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered LP4, which was suppose to have a pink undertone but the product I received is so vibrantly orange, that Iu2019m wondering if I received a mislabeled product.  I tried it anyways, and even though I donu2019t have dry under eyes I found this to be very dry looking, and drying to my skin.  I might try to see if I can make it work with an under eye primer but Iu2019m not hopeful.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: LP4 - vanilla fair skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Idk why it wonu2019t let me put the right shade but I got LP4 vanilla and it is not pink it is yellow. It would be the perfect shade if it was more pink! But love the product may choose the first shade the bone blush instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the formula of this product it was creamy, blended easily and did not feel heavy of the face. I did not notice any creasing over time either. This is marketed as a full coverage concealer but it definitely felt more medium coverage (after one layer) which I think works really well with the consistency of the foundation. I was gifted the shade DN3  which is also the shade I wear in the foundation. Tbh I think DN3 is too close to the foundation shade to brighten so I would recommend going 1/2 shades lighter to really brighten. This shade however works perfectly to spot conceal. Overall Iu2019m happy with the product and will be purchasing a brighter shade.

reviews.review_title: You NEED this in your makeup bag!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This concealer is absolutely amazing! The vegan formula helped to diminish the look of dark circles, concealed imperfections, diminished large pores and smoothed the appearance of fine lines, leaving a flawless look that I was able to wear all day. The brightening aspect of this concealer is my favorite part! After a sleepless night I had some errands to run the next morning. I applied this under my eyes and I went from looking like I got no sleep, to looking like I was well rested. 10/10 would recommend this to EVERYONE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a more liquid-y consistency but it is very easy to blend out and has a pretty good coverage. The only reason I knocked off a star is because the angled brush can be annoying when putting it back into the concealer.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: MN1 - ivory beige light medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This triple fix brightening concealer was just my shade. It's always hard picking a shade online but I've had luck so far! When using, it covers the skin flawlessly and has full coverage as mentioned on the packaging. I love that this concealer is clean as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this concealer free from LYS for my review. Sooou2026 wow, maybe my new favorite concealer? The shade LP4 is a perfect match for my light, cool skin. I also have the foundation in the same shade and they work great together. (Note: I prefer my concealer to be the same shade as my skin, not lighter, which is why I chose the same shade as my foundation.) This concealer is creamy and offers a great medium coverage. I donu2019t have much to cover, honestly, so Iu2019m mostly using it to even out the color under my eyes.  It blends out really nicely and doesnu2019t settle into my lines. I do always set my concealer with powder, but you donu2019t need much; this stands well on its own. Iu2019m really impressed and I recommend it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: TG5 - golden beige tan/olive skin with golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have really been enjoying this concealer. It blends beautifully and really melts into your skin. The formula is very light weight but easily buildable without looking or feeling cakey. It has worked really well on not creasing throughout the day while also providing coverage.  I loved the outer packaging which was aesthetically pleasing. My main con is the inner packaging of the concealer. Itu2019s in a triangle shape so the stopper on the inside was too small and the applicator and wand itself was very flimsy. It becomes difficult pulling the wand in or out. Other than the packaging, the formula itself is very good and skin like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in love with this formula! It it a full coverage concealer, but it looks so seamless on the skin, that sometimes I use it all over my face :) I like this little applicator, itu2019s very comfortable to use.  Nothing can beat the price.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This concealer has a really nice moisturizing finish, gives a great amount of coverage and feels very nice on the skin! I also love that the concealer has such skin loving ingredients!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous formula! It has a matte finish while providing beautiful and smooth coverage! A must for oily skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic concealer! Creamy, pigmented, buildable and long-lasting. So easy to apply and I love how naturally bright my under eyes look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this! The coverage was wonderful. I had some new acne scars that I needed to cover, and this did the trick. I could wear this alone as my base too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great concealer it is creamy and easy to apply, but wonu2019t crease throughout the day. It is perfect for long wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i was sent this Triple Fix Brightening Concealer by LYS Beauty and omg i love it! LYS products have such unique packaging, the triangular packaging is beautiful and really stands out! this concealer consists of a matte triangular shaped bottle and a rose gold shiny top which looks like high end makeup! i love how lightweight and creamy the texture is. It's so lightweight that it doesnu2019t even feel like i have anything on my skin. this concealer is perfect to use on both no makeup or makeup days! it doesnu2019t look cakey or crease at all. coverage is buildable and blends easily into the skin, so blendable, blends like butter leaving a natural skin-like finish. it's full coverage but doesnu2019t feel heavy or look cakey. it covers my dark circles very well and itu2018s long lasting! the formula is just very smooth and creamy and feels great on the skin. i love that this contains amazing ingredients such as Hyaluronic Acid, Watermelon Extract, Turmeric, and Ashwaghanda. i really appreciate the skincare infused ingredients. this feels hydrating and moisturizing and brightens up my skin leaving it looking flawless. a little product goes a long way, and i love that the wand grabs a lot of product, so you don't have to redunk your brush multiple times. i like the shape of the wand however I have issues with pulling it out and putting it back in the bottle; the opening is too tiny, and the wand is long and thin. but other than that, the concealer itself is amazing and i am very impressed. an amazing concealer quality wise and price wise. i love the shade range also! i love that LYS is cruelty free and vegan and i love what the brand stands for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first Lys product and omg am I in love! This concealer is so creamy and easy to apply. It blends in so well and the coverage is amazing. I used it on my under eye area and on some acne spots and the coverage lasted all day, no caking! I didnu2019t even need to apply foundation because my trouble spots were covered! The color match was spot on. Itu2019s officially my new favorite concealer! I canu2019t wait to try other Lys products!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: LN3 - bone blush very fair skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love how this concealer effortlessly blends and conceals my dark circles. It doesnu2019t crease or fade. Iu2019m so excited Iu2019ve finally found a concealer that truly covers imperfections.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: TG5 - golden beige tan/olive skin with golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage was good but didn't cover all of my eye circles. It blended in smoothly and fit in well with the rest of my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely amazing formula!! The ingredients are phenomenal, very moisturizing. The formula is very creamy and felt great on my skin. Iu2019m also in love with the shade range!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dark circles and sunken eyes so concealer is LIFE for me! I applied this concealer and immediately thought, u201cthis is so lightweight, how can it be full coverage?u201d But girlll I was blown away! I got full coverage that lasted a longgg work day. I usually colour correct but didnu2019t the first try and you wouldnu2019t even know it. Iu2019ve been using this concealer for days and it is truly something special! So lightweight yet it does the job. This is a must try! The packaging is cute but pulling the applicator out is a bit tight. Iu2019m hoping itu2019ll loosen up with more use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely amazing formula! The ingredients are phenomenal, especially the hyaluronic acid which will help with moisture. The formula is very creamy and felt great on the skin. Iu2019m also loving the shade range.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I typically do not wear concealer as I feel it typically adds to the appearance of fine lines, etc. I received this as pr & tried it immediately. This concealer is incredible.  It feels so close to skin, it's so creamy, it blended in to my skin invisibly & never settled in to my fine lines at all.  Super impressed & thing others will feel the same.  Lys knocked it out of the park with this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very impressed with how this concealer blends out. It just seems to melt into your skin, whether you use a sponge or your finger to blend it out. The formula feels lightweight but it provides a good amount of coverage. Because it's so lightweight, it doesn't look cakey or crease at all. The finish is skin like as well. It stayed looking good all day too.   I am shade MG5 in the foundation, and I received shade MG5 in the concealer. The concealer is ever so slightly lighter, but it's basically a perfect match to the foundation, so it's great for spot concealing. In the future, I would like to get a lighter shade to brighten my under eye area.  The only annoying thing about this concealer is the packaging! The triangle packaging matches the overall vibe and aesthetic of the brand. Practically, the packaging is annoying. It's very, very difficult to get the wand out of the tube. Sometimes, it flicks out some product and can make a mess. I'm always scared it's going to flick concealer on my clothes. It's also quite difficult getting the wand back into the tube, since the wand is so thin and the opening is so small.   If you can get past the packaging, this is a VERY good concealer, so still 5/5!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: TG7 - tan sand tan/olive skin with golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, great coverage! I was waiting for them to drop a concealer and they didnu2019t miss!! They definitely understood the assignment!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this concealer sits on my skin and covers all my dark circles. I used to use two concealer because of my color was so hard to find to match my skin. This just blends right in my skin and matches so well while giving me full coverage. I am full coverage girl I want my make up to look flawless and last long day and this just does that.  I will be definitely recommending this product to my family and friends as well. Thanks lys beauty for using clean ingredients and keeping the price affordable for everyone.

reviews.review_title: Super light weight and full coverage!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage of this concealer it is so beautiful and really hides my dark circles. My shade is DG6 and it is perfect. The formula is amazingly light weight and silky. I am so impressed. I am going to be using this daily. Highly recommend this to all clean beauty lovers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this concealer itu2019s full coverage but weightless and skin like. I have fine lines under the eyes and it looks so good on. This concealer is a MUST HAVE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this product free for review - I canu2019t rave enough about the formula and the product! Also have you seen what a fabulous price point it has?! I love the finish of the foundation, as well, so I am very happy to add this to my makeup arsenal.

reviews.review_title: The best affordable concealer at Sephora!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is so amazing! The formula is darn near weightless, but medium/light coverage. My freckles still poke through, which I love, but it evens out my complexion. It's super hydrating, and doesn't cling to dry spots. It works well with powder formulas as well. Super affordable and the shade range is great. I would recommend this and I'm going to be buying this. I got my wrong shade for free through the brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the consistency of this product. It's an interesting departure from the foundation formula, but still has many of the same qualities that I like. Where the foundation is more fluid & serum-like, this concealer feels more like a cream. It's less glowy and has higher coverage, but still has a natural-looking, skin-like finish, and all the same skincare benefits. I'm really enjoying this so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this concealer! The packaging is sleek with frosted glass, silver lid and triangle shape. The formula is smooth, creamy and lightweight. It covers my dark circles & blends right into the skin. The shade is perfect for my skin tone. Definitely my new favorite concealer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This brightening concealer worked well for me! It did not settle into my eye under lines it made under my eyes smooth and concealed my dark circles well. I used it around my nose where I have redness as well. It lasted all day without needing a touch up. I like the triangular shape of the bottle but it was a little difficult to close sometimes. I was really weary about it having a turmeric smell but it does not have any scent. I really love that it is vegan and cruelty free. I will keep this concealer as a makeup staple from now on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the LYS brand! The concealer is smooth and doesnu2019t cake up at all. Iu2019m a deep neutral and this fits with my complexion perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Finally found my favorite concealer that doesnu2019t look cakey underneath my eyes. Itu2019s ultra soft and looks so seamless. Applicator is perfect to apply and glides on smoothly. Concealer is absolutely buildable and gives the full coverage with brightness under the eye. Am so happy that it comes in 25 plus shades to choose from. Definitely surprised to see a concealer with turmeric and ashwagandha in it. I highly recommend this beautiful concealer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The triangular packaging is stunning! It looks like high end makeup with gold elements.   I like the shape of the wand however I have issues with pulling it out and putting it back. The opening is too tiny, and wand is long and thin.  Concealer feels, very hydrating and lightweight. It has medium buildable coverage and go on very nicely and blends pretty good.   It wears very good, no creasing but I set it with lightweight under eye powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t often use concealer because it tends to add texture rather than that flawless Look everyone strives for, but this concealer is different! I used it to even out my skin tone under some powder and it did such a lovely job of blending and covering imperfections. Itu2019s so lightweight that I didnu2019t feel like I had anything on my skin, and it lasted all day! Iu2019m so glad I have this product, Iu2019m the perfect shade, and I will definitely add it to my daily routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LYS has done it again with their new concealer! I am switching more to clean beauty and Iu2019m so glad I have found LYS. Not only are their products clean but they last all day and the color payoff is great. I really love their new concealer because itu2019s creamy and hydrating and stays on my undereyes all day. I also love that I can wear the concealer lightly for a quick look for the office and build for a more full coverage, evening look. I also really appreciate the skincare infused ingredients like Hyaluronic Acid for extra hydration. The price is also great at under $20!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing! I love how creamy it is and it provides the best coverage. The shade is perfect for my skin tone and itu2019s so lightweight. Would highly recommend!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: LP4 - vanilla fair skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this Triple Fix Brightening Concealer by Lys Beauty in exchange for my honest opinion and mannnnn did they deliver. Everything from the beautiful packaging which consists of a matte bottle and a rose gold shiny top. Like I think packaging is a big part of a product and they NAILED it! They have a really nice variety of shades and mine fits my skin tone perfectly. The application is really soft and doesnu2019t take out a whole lot of product which is nice (depending how you look at it) but for some reason (I could just have issues) I thought it was a little hard to re-insert back into the container once the brush was out? It covers so nicely especially over dark circles under my eyes. This was a major win in my book!! Canu2019t recommend it enough!!! I will definitely buy more when I run out. You will not be disappointed with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Triple Fix Full Coverage Brightening Concealer is amazing. I love the lightweight texture that easily blend and coverages dark circle under eyes area. It stays all day long! The packaging is beautiful and perfect size for traveling. The ingredients are amazing that contains Hyaluronic Acid, Squalane, Turmeric, and Ashwaghanda. It is definitely my must have concealer now!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: MN3 - neutral buff light medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The triangular packaging is stunning and sticks out amongst my other concealers. I love the applicator wand which has a narrow tip and allows for a  precious application. The wand is long and a little bit hard to take out and even harder to put back.   Coverage is buildable and the concealer blends easily into the skin. Iu2019ve been wearing the concealer all day today and even after 8 hours of wear it still looks flawless!  MN3 is a perfect match for my skin tone but since I prefer my concealers at least one shade lighter than my skin tone to u201cbrighten upu201d my under eye area, I will go a shade lighter next time.

reviews.review_title: Good for the skin good for the soul
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this light weight blend-able concealer truly hides my genetically darker under eyes and even my mom loved how it laid on her mature skin. Itu2019s good knowing something Iu2019m putting on my face everyday for all day wear is also helping my skin with good ingredients!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! Loved the packaging so much! Very cute and easy enough to travel with. I was super impressed when I applied it with my fingers, blended out very well! A little can go along way but definitely buildable for more coverage! This matched my skin tone so well I almost couldnu2019t tell it was there! Definitely give it a try! You wonu2019t regret it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: TG1 - latte light tan skin with golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off the packaging is cute! The initial coverage is medium and can be built to full coverage. The finish is a natural matte so I made sure to moisturize under my eyes. I had no issues blending out the concealer. Since the shade sent was the same as my skin tone I used a pink powder to set under my eyes to brighten.  I only had one issue with the packaging, the wand was difficult to take out and put back in as the opening was quite small. Other than that Iu2019m in love with this concealer!

reviews.review_title: lightweight but packs a whole punch!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, packaging is stunning as usual. The applicator itself is spot on and I like how it has a point shape so you can cover the tiniest imperfections. Tiny flaw: It is a little bit hard to put back in the tube because the hole is so small lol BUT Letu2019s talk about the concealer itself, itu2019s very lightweight but covers a lot. Just tried this on with my makeup and I like how little you put on but can cover a whole lot! Definitely recommend this

reviews.review_shade_purchased: DN5 - hazelnut dark brown skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this concealer, this is the first concealer Iu2019ve had a full coverage and natural finish! Itu2019s the perfect shade for spot on coverage , They could be used for highlight and contour , the shade range is broad which I like because women of color have so many different undertones and skin tones. The concealer did not set or exaggerate my fine lines , over all itu2019s a Great Product !

reviews.review_title: Wasn't sure what to expect but I'm happy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this to try from LYS Beauty. I love the packaging it's very sleek and continues with the Triangle shape that is now in my opinion synonymous with LYS. Since the foundation was so lightweight and skin like I was a bit skeptical about this concealer being full coverage. I was pleasantly surprised that not only was it full coverage and could cover the dark circles it worked really well as a no foundation makeup day. It dries matte unlike the foundation but a soft matte. I have very dry skin and I can't do spackle so this works great for me. I love that this shade matches my skin so well and even when I added a brightening concealer over it my eyes don't look cakey.  I shared a pic of it next to foundation shade TN6 they're close. The concealer is just a bit peachier which is great for color correcting

reviews.review_shade_purchased: TN6 - honey tan/olive skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this concealer! At first I thought it wasnu2019t going to cover much but easily covered red spots that I had. It blends really well with my natural skin tone & felt lightweight
